name: V_EHI_AUDIT_DCS
description: This view contains audit information for document records for the purpose of Electronic Health Information (EHI) export.

columns.name: DOC_INFO_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the document information record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient associated with the document record.

columns.name: CHANGE_TIME
columns.description: The instant when the value was changed.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Audit of the line number that changed

columns.name: NEW_VALUE_EXTERNAL
columns.description: The value after the audited change in external format. This column shows the translated external value as of when the column was last extracted.

columns.name: OLD_VALUE_EXTERNAL
columns.description: The value before the audited change in external format. This column shows the translated external value as of when the column was last extracted.

columns.name: NEW_VALUE_INTERNAL
columns.description: The value of the item after it was changed in internal format.

columns.name: OLD_VALUE_INTERNAL
columns.description: The value of the item before it was changed in internal format.

columns.name: CHANGED_DATA_ELEMENT
columns.description: The name of the Clarity table and column corresponding to the changed data.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the employee who changed the item.

columns.name: USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
